Player History
Signed as a free agent by Los Angeles on 4/3/1985 to a minor league deal...
Traded from Los Angeles to Chicago on 7/24/1985 (Going to LAD: P Rick Sutcliffe. Going to CHC: P Juan Guzman, P Darren Holmes, LF Devon White, SS Jose Vizcaino)...
Had first career hit on 4/3/1988, off Ron Romanick (SD)...
Hit first career homerun on 4/6/1988, off Tom Candiotti (PIT)...
Drove in 6 runs against St. Louis on 4/25/1988...
Won Player of the Week award on 6/5/1989, hitting .545 with 1 HR, 6 RBI...
Injured on 8/5/1989 with a Strained Back Muscle, out for one week...
2/2/1990: Gets a new one-year contract worth $1,921,429 through salary arbitration...
